nodes.text: Zebitrope IV, also known as Zebitrope, was the fourth planet in the Zebitrope system of the Centrality, located in the Outer Rim. The world was known for its rolling savannas as well as being the homeworld of the lizard species that produced the drug lesai.
The PC video game Star Wars: Rebellion mistakenly places Zebitrope IV in the Dufilvan sector, a misspelling of the true Dufilvian sector.
